channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup - May 17, 2019
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-may-17-2019) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog!
We've got AP sessions from great games like *Rovers*, *The Veil*, *Hit the Streets*, and much more! Thanks to everyone who facilitated and played, and if you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Hangouts category](https://discourse.funtimers.club/c/gauntlet-hangouts) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/) to play! Everyone is welcome!

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup - May 17, 2019
item.dc:creator: @Alun_R
item.description:
@Alun_R wrote:

I’d have to say this is a fantastic community to both play with and run for.

Read full topic

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup - May 17, 2019
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

Holy moley, what a week. That’s a shocking range of games-- and no straight takes of the old stand-bys (Dungeon World, Monsterhearts 2). And almost 20 GMs. And we have games on the calendar that aren’t recording, so there’s even more.

Read full topic
